nodes.text: Sweet-sand cookies were a variety of cookie, that originated from the planet Calus. They were often served with tarine tea. Obi-Wan Kenobi once recalled discussing surrender with Whorm Loathsom. When the Kerkoiden general found out that it was, in fact, his surrender they were discussing; Kenobi says he became "most ungentlemanly" and didn't offer him a sweet-sand cookie.
